title: Ghost in the Shell (2015)
alternative_title: Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie, 攻殻機動隊 新劇場版
description: In the year 2027, a year following the end of the non-nuclear World War IV, a bomb has gone off in Newport City, killing a major arms dealer who may have ties with the mysterious 501 Organization. Public Security official Daisuke Aramaki hires full-body cyber prosthesis user and hacker extraordinaire, Motoko Kusanagi, to investigate.
